Name: Tetron
About the game: You wake up in a place that is at once familiar and foreign to you. With your abilities and memories damaged all you know is one thing: You are the last Tetron, and the creatures here have cursed you, slaughtered your brethren, and are out to finish your race. Now Is the Time For Vengeance. Collect battle tomes to upgrade various aspects of your characters attack, defense, speed, or essence. Carefully manage your mana: should you save it for a devastating attack, or an upgrade? Fight the dangerous horde at night, or fall asleep near the warmth of the campfire. Traverse 3 areas each with various enemies, minibosses, bosses, and encounters. Unlock new characters, cosmetics, and game modifiers to adjust the game to your skill and playstyle
